description: it's 4 different trails that brunch out and theres a brook that runs through from the reservoir and has fishing you can also take a canoe or kayak.
directions: Go to top of Gaspeareau mountain then take a left on forest hill road go right to the end then hike from there.

stats.Activities: snowshoe river-canoe hike ski-bc ski-xc mtn-bike

title: millenium trail
